bach.DataFrame.set_index¶

DataFrame.set_index(keys, drop=True, append=False)[source]¶

Set this dataframe’s index to the the index given in keys

Parameters

  • keys (Union[str, Series, Sequence[Union[str, Series]]]) – the keys of the new index. Can be a column name str, a Series, or a list of those. If Series are passed, they should have the same base node as the DataFrame they are set on.

  • drop (bool) – delete columns to be used as the new index.

  • append (bool) – whether to append to the existing index or replace.

Returns

a DataFrame with the new index.

Return type

DataFrame
